content.text: Technician
Support and control specialist. Hack systems, disrupt enemies, buff allies, keep the crew running. Abilities focus on information, equipment manipulation, and tactical coordination.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
System Scan (Passive): At the start of combat, automatically identify one enemy’s weakest stat. GM reveals their lowest stat.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Overclock Ally (Active, 1 AP): An ally within Close range gets +2 accuracy on their next attack this turn.
Disrupt (Active, 1 AP): An enemy within Medium range gets -2 accuracy on their next attack.
Field Patch (Passive): Healing Stims you use on allies (not yourself) heal an additional 1d4.
Analyze Weakness (Active, 1 AP): Target an enemy. All attacks against that target get +1 accuracy until end of your next turn. You broadcast targeting data.
Quick Fix (Passive): Items you use in combat cost 1 less AP (minimum 0). Stims, scrubbers, grenades — all faster in your hands.
Remote Access (Active, 1 AP): Activate a piece of equipment within Medium range without being adjacent. Trigger a trap, activate a beacon, open a door, start a generator. Requires line of sight.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
System Crash (Active, 2 AP): Disable one piece of an enemy’s equipment within Medium range until end of your next turn. Tech check (DC 8). Weapon, armor property, shield — your choice.
Tactical Relay (Active, 1 AP): An ally can immediately spend up to 2 AP as a reaction (out of turn). You coordinate a snap response.
Drone Redirect (Passive): Drone Swarm weapons attack autonomously for 0 AP at -2 accuracy. Free imprecise damage.
Countermeasure (Passive): When an enemy uses a tech or Interface-based ability within Medium range, you may spend 1 AP as a reaction to negate it. Once per round.
Efficiency Protocol (Passive): Once per turn, reduce the AP cost of one ally’s action by 1 (minimum 1). You optimize their timing. Must be within Close range.

Sabotage Ammo (Active, 1 AP): Target an enemy’s ranged weapon within Medium range. Tech check (DC 7). On success, their next ranged attack misfires — no damage, turn wasted. The weapon still works after that.
Neural Spike (Active, 2 AP): Target an enemy with cybernetic augments within Medium range. Tech check (DC 8). On success, they take -2 to all checks for 1 round as their systems scramble.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
EMP Burst (Active, 3 AP): All enemies within Close range with tech/augments have equipment disabled for 1 round. Once per encounter.
Combat Coordinator (Passive): At the start of each round, swap initiative positions of two allies. Allies within Close range get +1 to social checks in combat.

Master Engineer (Passive): All equipment you operate gets +1 to its effect (Field Hospital heals +1 per die, Scrub Station removes +1 per die, weapons you’ve personally modified get +1 damage per die). Your hands make everything better.

Puppet Master (Active, 3 AP): Take control of an enemy’s cybernetic augments or tech weapon for 1 round. The enemy cannot use the controlled item and you can activate it remotely — firing their weapon at their allies, or shutting down their augmented armor. Tech check (DC 10). Once per encounter.
